Datawrapper Basemaps

Source: R/dw_basemaps.R
dw_basemaps.Rd

Look up basemaps with their available keys.

dw_basemaps

Format

Data frame with columns

id

id of the basemap. Required for call to dw_get_map_key.

level

Geographic level of this basemap

value

Value of the keys. Required for call to dw_get_map_key.

label

Short name of the keys

description

Description of the keys.

Source

<https://api.datawrapper.de/plugin/basemaps>

Examples

  dw_basemaps

#> # A tibble: 4,604 x 6
#>    id             level  slug  value      label       description               
#>    <chr>          <chr>  <chr> <chr>      <chr>       <chr>

#>  3 world-2019     World  world GERMAN_NA… Name (Germ… The written name of the c…
#>  4 world-2019     World  world GERMAN_NA… Name old (… The written name of the c…
#>  5 africa-2020    Africa afri… DW_NAME    Name        The three-letter ISO-code…
#>  6 africa-2020    Africa afri… DW_STATE_… ISO-Code    The written name of the c…
#>  7 europe-sovere… Europe euro… ISO_3_SOV  ISO 3-digit DE21, FR24, TR42, ...     
#>  8 europe-sovere… Europe euro… ISO_2_SOV  ISO 2-digit DE21, FR24, TR42, ...     
#>  9 europe-sovere… Europe euro… NAME_SOV   Names       Olpe, Somerset, Toledo, .…
#> 10 europe-sovere… Europe euro… GERMAN_NA… Names (Ger… Olpe, Somerset, Toledo, .…
#> # … with 4,594 more rows
